content:
addRule()
	.when(And.all(JavaClass.references(javax.enterprise.{packages}.{*}).at([ANNOTATION])
		.as(discard), XmlFile
		.matches(/m:project/m:dependencies[count(m:dependency/m:artifactId[contains(
		., 'cdi-api')]) = 0 and count(m:dependency/m:artifactId[contains(
		., 'quarkus-')]) = 0]).inFile(pom.xml).as(dependencies-section))
)
	.perform(Iteration.over(?).as(dependencies-section_instance).perform(2 with var 'null')
)
withId("cdi-to-quarkus-groovy-00020")
